```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(data.table)
library(tmap)
library(usmap)
```

```{r}

tuesdata <- 
  tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2022-02-08')

tuesdata <-
  as.data.table(tuesdata$airmen)

```

```{r}

state_counts <- 
  tuesdata[, .(N = .N), by = "state"] 

plot_usmap(
  regions = "state", 
  data = state_counts,
  values = "N") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom"
  ) +
  scale_fill_gradientn(
    colours = c(
      "#97A6A0",
      "#E4F2E7",
      "#93BFB7",
      "#387373",
      "#2D3E40"
    )
  ) +
  labs(
    fill = "Count"
  )

```
